mapper.update: update pet set p_category = #{pCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_name = #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_photoUrls = #{pPhotourls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_tags = #{pTags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_status = #{pStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select p_id, p_category, p_name, p_photoUrls, p_tags, p_status from pet
